title: Why no new champ select for solo queue ;(
body:
Cmon no champ select for solo queue?
Riot pls helps{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: The new champ select is already in place for Ranked. If you mean a new champ select for Normals, then no, there is not currently a new champ select and you would have to wait for Normals (Draft) Mode.
do you mean normal queue? yes you do, and yes, we can only wait for the further conversion of champ selects
Wait so normals is also getting a new champ select??{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
there is a new champ select for solo q
